scripts.autodev: node ./deploy/version.js && umi build && node ./deploy/upload.js config=config.dev.json && npm run deploydev v=max
scripts.autostaging: node ./deploy/version.js && umi build && node ./deploy/upload.js config=config.staging.json && npm run deploystaging v=max
scripts.uploadapp: node ./deploy/upload.js config=config.app.json && npm run deploydev v=max
scripts.uploaddev: node ./deploy/upload.js config=config.dev.json && npm run deploydev v=max
